title: Items vertical slice (epic)
description:
First vertical slice: build Items content type end-to-end.

This validates the entire authoring pipeline from editor to runtime.

Components:
1. Schema: Item table in SQLite, Rust struct
2. Editor UI: Form for item CRUD (bevy_egui)
3. Editor API: REST endpoints for items (axum)
4. Data Pipeline: Load items from SQLite, hot-reload on change
5. Runtime: Spawn items, pickup handling, effect application
6. Verification: Tests for authoring workflow

Completion criteria:
- User can define item in editor
- Item spawns in game with correct properties
- Changes to item hot-reload
- Item definition persists across restarts

See: docs/build-order.md Phase 2
close_reason: Items vertical slice complete: schema, registry, spawning, editor UI, editor API, integration tests. Hot-reload stub exists for future enhancement.

title: Item schema and SQLite table
description:
Define the Item data model and create SQLite schema.

Rust struct:
```rust
#[derive(Debug, Serialize, Deserialize)]
struct ItemDefinition {
    name: String,
    item_type: ItemType,
    description: Option<String>,
    effects: Vec<Effect>,
    // ... other fields
}
```

SQLite table:
```sql
CREATE TABLE items (
    id TEXT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    item_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    data BLOB NOT NULL,
    created_at INTEGER NOT NULL,
    updated_at INTEGER NOT NULL
);
```

Crate: roguebench-core (types) + roguebench-engine (schema)
Part of: Items vertical slice
close_reason: Item types in core, SQLite schema with JSON storage, full CRUD tests
